title: Consider financing of two-wheelers in rural areas under priority sector: FIDC to RBI
description: "Considering the value and usage, we request the respected authority to consider the financial assistance to purchase two-wheeler in the rural economy as priority sector lending, as this will enable lenders to provide timely funds at cheaper cost," the letter read.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
